entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kincardine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then a few flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
